mapper.insert: INSERT INTO property (property_user, property_title, property_address, property_content, property_carousel, property_video, property_category, property_type, property_city, property_gu, property_price, property_deposit, property_cost, property_size, property_bedroom, property_bathroom, property_option) VALUES (#{property_user}, #{property_title}, #{property_address}, #{property_content}, #{property_carousel}, #{property_video}, #{property_category}, #{property_type}, #{property_city}, #{property_gu}, #{property_price}, #{property_deposit}, #{property_cost}, #{property_size}, #{property_bedroom}, #{property_bathroom}, #{property_option})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM property ORDER BY property_date DESC
SELECT * FROM property WHERE property_status = 'open' ORDER BY property_date DESC limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT count(*) FROM property WHERE property_status = 'open'
SELECT count(*) FROM property WHERE property_user = #{property_user} AND property_status = 'open'
SELECT * FROM property WHERE property_status = 'open' AND property_user = #{user_email} ORDER BY property_date DESC
SELECT distinct property.* FROM property JOIN love ON property_id = love_property JOIN user ON love_user = #{user_email} AND property_status = 'open' ORDER BY love_id DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM property WHERE property_user = #{user_email} AND property_status = 'sold'
SELECT property_city FROM property GROUP BY property_city
SELECT property_gu FROM property WHERE property_city = #{property_city} GROUP BY property_gu

SELECT * FROM property
WHERE property_deposit<=1000 AND property_type='오피스텔'
WHERE property_option&2 != 0 AND property_type='상가/사무실'
WHERE property_option&8 != 0 AND property_type='원룸+'
ORDER BY property_id DESC

SELECT count(*) FROM property
WHERE property_deposit<=1000 AND property_type='오피스텔'
WHERE property_option&2 != 0 AND property_type='상가/사무실'
WHERE property_option&8 != 0 AND property_type='원룸+'
